description:
This set includes a number of utilities installed as part of configuring new Windows machine:
7zip.install, 7zip.commandline, AutoHotKey_L, Calibre, CCleaner, CloseTheDoor, Console2, CrystalDiskInfo, Defraggler, Dexpot, Filezilla, Firefox, FoxitReader, FreeCommander, Git.Install, GoogleChrome, HTTrack, Inssider, Intel.SSD.Toolbox, KeePass, MicrosoftSecurityEssentials, MobaXTerm, Monosnap, NetScan64, NimbleText, nmap, NugetPackageExplorer, PDFCreator, PomoTime, Powershell, Putty, ResophNotes, RMPrepUSB, RoyalTS, Secunia.PSI, SetACL, Shotcut, Shotty, SkyDrive, Skype, Speccy, SyncBack, Synergy, SwissFileKnife, TeamViewer, TeraCopy, Terminals.app, thebrain.install, Tunnelier, VirtualCloneDrive, VLC, WinDirStat, WindowsRepair, WinSCP, XMind.
author: Jivko Kolev
